detail: I developed a Web-based application featuring a Home page, Product page, Product category, Product details, and Shopping cart.
Technologies Used: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap

I worked on an Android-based Billing and Inventory Management System, enabling small shopkeepers to manage billing and inventory by scanning product barcodes. The app is available on the Google Play Store.
Technologies: XML, Java, Android Studio, Firebase.

I developed a web-based application for a clinic where patients can schedule appointments. The application also allows users to ask questions without requiring signup or login. Additionally, it features a landing page with other relevant information.
Technologies Used: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap.
I worked on the Blood Bank Management System, a web-based application enabling administrators to efficiently manage blood stock, donor details, seeker information, and overall blood bank operations.
Technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, MongoDB.
